categories: Category:Battles of the Galactic Civil War

nodes.text: The Battle of Tantive V was a battle between forces of the New Republic and a small force commanded by Admiral Gaen Drommel.

During the battle, two of Drommel's three Imperial-class Star Destroyers were destroyed, while one, the Wolf's Claw, was captured. Drommel's flagship, the Executor-class Star Dreadnought Guardian, took heavy damage, but managed to retreat to Soullex. Admiral Drommel himself survived the battle. Guardian was later captured over Soullex by the New Republic and added to their naval forces.
